A pillowcase can be used as a protective cover for fragile items during transportation.
A pillowcase can be used as a makeshift travel pillow for long car rides or airplane flights.
A pillowcase can be used as a protective cover for a camera or other photography equipment.
A pillowcase can be used as a protective cover for a musical instrument such as a guitar or violin.
A pillowcase can be used as a protective cover for a small appliance such as a blender or food processor.
